space.arim.api.platform

Interface FormattingManipulator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPlatformMessages, BungeeMessages, SpigotMessages, SpongeMessages

    public interface FormattingManipulator
    A utility which operates on Strings to change their formatting.
    Author:
    A248

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default String center(String msg)
      Centers a message using the '&' formatting codes to detect colours and styles.
      default String center(String msg, FormattingCodePattern formattingPattern)
      Centers a message using the specified formatting code char to detect colours and styles.
      default String stripFormatting(String msg)
      Removes valid formatting codes from a message.
      default String stripFormatting(String msg, FormattingCodePattern formattingPattern)
      Removes valid formatting codes from a message using the given formatting code char.
      default String stripJson(String msg)
      Removes all Json message formatting
      default String transformFormattingCodes(String msg, FormattingCodePattern sourceFormattingPattern)
      Changes valid formatting codes using the given source char to equivalent codes using '&' as the target char.
      default String transformFormattingCodes(String msg, FormattingCodePattern sourceFormattingPattern, char targetFormattingChar)
      Changes valid formatting codes using the given source char to equivalent codes using the target char.

    • Method Detail

      • transformFormattingCodes

        default String transformFormattingCodes(String msg,
                                        FormattingCodePattern sourceFormattingPattern,
                                        char targetFormattingChar)
        Changes valid formatting codes using the given source char to equivalent codes using the target char.
        Parameters:
        msg - the source message
        sourceFormattingPattern - the pattern corresponding to the source formatting code char
        targetFormattingChar - the target formatting code char
        Returns:
        the input string with valid formatting codes converted

      • transformFormattingCodes

        default String transformFormattingCodes(String msg,
                                        FormattingCodePattern sourceFormattingPattern)
        Changes valid formatting codes using the given source char to equivalent codes using '&' as the target char.
        Parameters:
        msg - the source message
        sourceFormattingPattern - the pattern corresponding to the source formatting code char
        Returns:
        the input string with valid formatting codes converted

      • stripFormatting

        default String stripFormatting(String msg,
                               FormattingCodePattern formattingPattern)
        Removes valid formatting codes from a message using the given formatting code char.
        Parameters:
        msg - the source message
        formattingPattern - the pattern corresponding to the formatting code char
        Returns:
        the same message with valid colours removed

      • stripFormatting

        default String stripFormatting(String msg)
        Removes valid formatting codes from a message.
        Parameters:
        msg - the source message
        Returns:
        the same message with valid colours removed

      • stripJson

        default String stripJson(String msg)
        Removes all Json message formatting
        Parameters:
        msg - the source message
        Returns:
        the same message with only text, colours, and styles remaining

      • center

        default String center(String msg,
                      FormattingCodePattern formattingPattern)
        Centers a message using the specified formatting code char to detect colours and styles.

        The centering is precise, taking into account individual character lengths and applied formatting codes.
        Messages with line breaks ('\n') are treated properly; each individual line is centered.
        Parameters:
        msg - the message to center
        formattingPattern - the pattern corresponding to the formatting code char
        Returns:
        a centered message

      • center

        default String center(String msg)
        Centers a message using the '&' formatting codes to detect colours and styles.

        The centering is precise, taking into account individual character lengths and applied formatting codes.
        Messages with line breaks ('\n') are treated properly; each individual line is centered.
        Parameters:
        msg - the message to center
        Returns:
        a centered message
